Donald Trump Jr: and other Trump campaign officials agreed to meet Natalia Veselnitskaya at Trump Tower in June 2016.
They were told they would meet with a: Russian government attorney" and were promised official documents and information incriminating Hillary Clinton and her dealings with Russia.
Rudy Giuliani falsely claimed that they: t know Veselnitskaya was a representative of the Russian government.
Emails released by Trump Jr: later revealed that he was expecting to meet with a "Russian government attorney" who would provide useful information on Clinton from the Russian government.
